Inside the base, Warhead tried to catch something and rise. His 
motricity was still awful, but the call of the battle and the mockery 
of those Tripredacus were too strong. He managed to stand up, but 
putting one leg in front of the other was impossible.

Warhead: If I can not stand, I will transform!

He went into his hovercraft mode, which was much more mobile. He made 
it out of the base and, seeing Spike, fired at him with machine guns.

Tyrael saw Spike too and greeted him.

Tyrael: Whoever you are, you are welcome with us Tripredacus. Now 
fight with us!

As he said these words, he received fully Quickstrike's energy blast. 
He countered, after getting up, with two light blasts of his own.

Tyrael: Very well, Megatron. We shall have it your way. Know this, 
though: the Dragon is a tough kill, but the Phoenix rises after dying! 
Now get out and fight me! Tripredacus! Attack now!

Burrock, on his side, avoided the rocket shot by Inferno, but not by 
much. He got fried a bit from the blast, but was otherwise alright.

Burrock: This sure beats those other absent clowns! NOW WHO'S THE 
SMART METAL ASS WHO FIRED ON ME? YOU THE ONE?

He turned to Inferno and tried to grab him with his tendrils and crush 
him.
